name: Cyberspank
description:
Shot 'em before they can get ya!

Cyberspank is an intense arena wave shooter with a lot of flying bullets and intense action. Make your way through all the different areas to get the best shot at surviving as long as possible. Try to get the best score and most kills as you can!

We made this!

Cyberspank is a student project made in 2 weeks at Futuregames Higher Vocational Educations in Stockholm, Sweden. The game was created for the course "Prototyping in Unity" with the purpose to make systems. The team included Mattias "Mau" Lundell,  Gustav Erik Lidén,  Ali Hamad. This game was made october 2020 in Unity.
